document_name_accent: sa tu cung khi mang thai.json
document_title: Uterine prolapse during pregnancy: Causes, signs, treatment
subsection_content: To diagnose uterine prolapse during pregnancy, your doctor may do some tests such as examining the vagina and uterus. During the pelvic floor exam, your doctor may ask you to perform the same pushing movements as you do when you go to the bathroom, to assess the extent of the condition. In addition, the doctor will also check the strength of the pelvic floor muscles through activities such as the ability to contract strongly or weakly and relax the muscles... (4)
subsection_title: sa tu cung khi mang thai.json. Diagnostic method
subsection_data:
sa tu cung khi mang thai.json. Diagnostic method
To diagnose uterine prolapse during pregnancy, your doctor may do some tests such as examining the vagina and uterus. During the pelvic floor exam, your doctor may ask you to perform the same pushing movements as you do when you go to the bathroom, to assess the extent of the condition. In addition, the doctor will also check the strength of the pelvic floor muscles through activities such as the ability to contract strongly or weakly and relax the muscles... (4)
